name: Kshitiz Saxena
com: This place has nice ambiance with a variety of good food. I usually visit this place at least once a week and always love the food. Prices also good.

name: Pankaj Patel
com: Lovely interior .Lovely food served by lovely staff . Worth visiting .go for it . You will not regret . I am sure you will visit again and will bring yr friends too.

name: Bhakti
com: Amazing food with lovely presentation. Excellent environment, friendly service, great menu choices and really decent food at affordable prices.

name: Himcrown
com: Quality food and friendly, courteous staff makes dining experience enjoyable. Have tried Punjabi and Chinese menu options. Ambiance is cool.

name: Rudra Shastri
com: I visit this restaurant quite oftenðŸ˜… I generally like everything here but my most loved is The Tandoor Platter, Manchurian Dry and Biriyani. Punjabi is also satisfactory. This place is really pocket friendly, you can surely visit for great food.

name: Nishant Jha
com: Absolutely fabulous food. Everyone in the family loved it. And as always, quick delivery by Zomato. 100% recommended.

name: Prakash Parekh
com: A restaurant is well in management, hospitality and food quality. Taste of foods is good. Good Space for Family and social gathering.
